subject: Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The Agency for Cycling Ethics, the company in charge of the internal antidoping testing programs for several top teams, quietly closed its doors last week after about two years in business.
snippet: The Agency for Cycling Ethics, the company in charge of the internal antidoping testing programs for several top teams, quietly closed its doors last week after about two years in business.
